oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tuneable and dual-band circular microstrip antenna with stubs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GIRISH KUMAR
RAY, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: uhf antennas
antenna accessories
antenna radiation patterns
microstrip antennas
multifrequency antennas
transmission line theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A circular microstrip antenna loaded along its feed axis with either one stub or two stubs has been analyzed using an improved linear transmission line model. When the length of the stub is small, the frequency is tuned over a 9% range in the L-band and, when it is comparable to Î»/4, it exhibits dual-frequency operation. The experimental results are in good agreement with the theoretical results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IEEE Transactions on Antennas and Propagation 48(7), 1036-39
